name: qrttoppm
description: qrttoppm - convert output from the QRT ray tracer into a portable pixmap
body:
qrttoppm

NAME

qrttoppm - convert output from the QRT ray tracer into a portable pixmap

SYNOPSIS

qrttoppm [qrtfile]

DESCRIPTION

Reads a QRT file as input. Produces a portable pixmap as output.

SEE ALSO

ppm(5)

AUTHOR
